text.div:
This code system http://ihris.org/fhir/CodeSystem/ihris-resource-codesystem defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
role iHRIS RoleUser roles that are available to be assigned to users.
task iHRIS TaskRole tasks that are available to be assigned to roles
page iHRIS PagePage definitions for viewing and editing resources.
practitioner-link iHRIS Practitioner LinkBasic resource for customization that links to a Practitioner.
training-link iHRIS Training LinkBasic resource for customization that links to a Qualify training.
visualization iHRIS Data VisualizationiHRIS Data Visualization
dashboard iHRIS DashboardiHRIS Dashboard
resourcedata Resource DataResource Data

name: IhrisResourceCodeSystem
title: Code System for iHRIS Basic Resources.

concept.definition: User roles that are available to be assigned to users.
Role tasks that are available to be assigned to roles
Page definitions for viewing and editing resources.
Basic resource for customization that links to a Practitioner.
Basic resource for customization that links to a Qualify training.
